description: I am a passionate .NET Developer based in Cairo, Egypt, with a strong focus on building scalable and user-centered web applications. I specialize in ASP.NET Core for backend development and Angular for creating dynamic, responsive front-end interfaces.

My work includes full-stack solutions for platforms serving charitable organizations, with an emphasis on clean architecture, performance, and multilingual support. I'm continuously improving my skills in modern development practices and cloud technologies like Azure.

services.title: Frontend Development with Angular
services.description: Building responsive and interactive web interfaces using Angular, with a focus on usability, performance, and seamless user experiences.

services.title: Backend Development with .NET
services.description: Creating robust and secure APIs using ASP.NET Core, C#, and SQL Server with clean architecture and scalable backend logic.

testimonials.text: Mohamed is an exceptional .NET developer with a deep understanding of the Microsoft ecosystem. His ability to write clean, maintainable code and solve complex problems makes him an invaluable team member. I've had the pleasure of working with him on several projects.
Working with Mohamed was a great experience. He delivered high-quality .NET applications on time and within budget. His technical expertise and communication skills made our project successful.

education.institution: Faculty of Computer and Information Sciences
education.description: Specialized in software engineering with focus on .NET development and web technologies.

projects.title: Free Mentor – Online Learning Platform
projects.description: A platform offering free educational resources with interactive, mobile-friendly learning and curated, high-quality content for students.

projects.title: Bulky Book – E-Commerce MVC Web App
projects.description: ASP.NET Core 8-based e-commerce platform with secure authentication, responsive UI, and Stripe payment integration.

projects.title: GameZone - ASP.NET MVC Web App
projects.description: A CRUD web app for managing games, demonstrating MVC architecture and Entity Framework integration.

projects.title: Educational Center Web Application
projects.description: Student services platform including FAQs, testimonials, real-time updates, and branch locator. Backend integration led by team leader.

projects.title: ICPC Tanta Community API
projects.description: RESTful API supporting ICPC Tanta website with user roles, event schedules, forum features, AI hints, and JWT-secured messaging.

projects.title: HopeGivers – Charity Organizations Platform
projects.description: Global charity platform with secure authentication, role-based access, and robust backend architecture using clean patterns.
